Design a unique plastic bottle that can be recycled into a stylish backpack or purse.
Create a water filtration system for plastic bottles that uses natural materials like activated carbon or bamboo.
Develop a plastic bottle recycling program that incentivizes individuals and businesses to recycle their plastic waste.
Create a line of eco-friendly beauty products made from plastic bottle waste.
Develop a mobile app that connects individuals with local organizations working to recycle plastic waste.
